title: @Riot: Weird texture bug on Warden Karma skin
body:
Warden Karma skin came out last patch, everything was fine, I used it constantly and I was enjoying the beautiful skin. After this week's patch, I've notice a weird texture on one of her fabric.

http://i.imgur.com/5kcRvWe.png

Something worth pointing out since I bought it when it came out and now it looks weird, I can't stop noticing it while I'm playing the game. Is it fixable? Is it a bug?

replies.body: That part also has the tip become translucent and the same thing happens in her Order of the Lotus skin,i'd give at minimum 4 months before they decide to care and fix it as it took them 4 months to add fans in her dance with her Lotus skin
This was a texture issue that affected several skins. We've fixed the issue and it should be making its way to live soon.
4 months? Wow. Hopefully it doesnt take long with this one. I mean, it wasn't showing in the previous patch, I dont know what's causing it in this patch.

Hey Forbidden Siren,

Thanks for the awesome report - images are always super helpful when it comes to visual issues. 

This issue did begin occurring in patch 5.21. Looks like we have a fix for this already, so you should be seeing a fix for this on live soon. ^-^
